original_text: Else if ye do in any wise go back, and cleave unto the remnant of these nations, even these that remain among you, and shall make marriages with them, and go in unto them, and they to you:
korean_text: 너희가 만일 돌아서서 너희 중에 남아 있는 이 민족들을 가까이 하여 더불어 혼인하며 서로 왕래하면

sentences.original_text: Else if ye do in any wise go back
and cleave unto the remnant of these nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 민족들의 남은 자에게 붙어

sentences.original_text: even these that remain among you
and shall make marriages with them
